members.signatureBeforeChange: Point layoutVertical (Composite composite, boolean move, boolean wrap, int height, boolean flushCache)
members.signatureAfterChange: Point layoutVertical (Composite composite, boolean move, boolean wrap, int height, boolean flushCache)
diff: -	int maxY = 0, x = marginLeft, y = marginTop;
